  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        my_analyzer: {
          tokenizer: "keyword",
          filter: ["my_custom_word_delimiter_filter"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        my_custom_word_delimiter_filter: {
          type: "word_delimiter",
          type_table: ["- => ALPHA"],
          split_on_case_change: false,
          split_on_numerics: false,
          stem_english_possessive: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
